name: Frank Fux
description:
Welcome to Frank Fux!

In this daring adventure, you as Frank Fux try to using wit and jumping power to escape the depths of the dungeon and satisfy your greed.
Navigate Frank from platform to platform with only one direction in mind - upwards!
But be careful! A wrong jump can quickly send you back into the depths.

The madness never ends - or does it?

The principle sounds simple: jump and land...or fall!
- Hold the jump button to increase your jumping power and release it to jump
- Think carefully about where you jump - once you're in the air, the decision is final
- All your progress (...or regression) will be saved
- Reach the goal to successfully complete your adventure and make Frank happy

Will you manage to get to the top?

Don't be discouraged!
All beginnings are difficult - including for Frank.
- A fall can be frustrating, but you can learn from it!
- Develop a sense for the optimal jumping power to reach your goal.
- Climb platform by platform, but be aware of the risk. The higher you are, the deeper you can fall!

Don't be a wimp and don't give up!


What else awaits me?
- 2D pixel art design with cute characters and animations
- Pleasant, calm music - maybe it will help you get over a fall or two :)
- Atmospheric level
- Challenging gameplay with increasing thrills


Whether you make it or not depends entirely on you!
